reviewtext: I was looking for a cheap lens that I could buy to go along with my Canon EOS 10D (which was also cheap). I am in high school but I am not in the school's photography class. My friend and I went out to take pictures and she showed them to her photo teacher and he liked mine better than he liked hers! He said that all the pictures I took were way less blurry than my friends even though I used manual focus.
